languages.text: Бледная от злости Маттина обернулась к Вольному Торговцу. "У капитана Вести своеобразное чувство юмора! Я решительно прошу Вашу Светлость повлиять на него!"

traits.locale_text: Бледная от злости Маттина обернулась к Вольному торговцу. "У капитана Вести своеобразное чувство юмора! Я решительно прошу Ваше Благородие повлиять на него!"

languages.text: White with anger, Mattina turned to the Rogue Trader. "Captain Vesti has a unique sense of humour! I strongly suggest that Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} take him in hand!"
languages.original_text: Бледная от злости Маттина обернулась к Вольному Торговцу. "У капитана Вести своеобразное чувство юмора! Я решительно прошу Вашу Светлость повлиять на него!"

traits.locale_text: White with anger, Mattina turned to the Rogue Trader. "Captain Vesti has a unique sense of humor! I strongly suggest that Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} take him in hand!"

White with anger, Mattina turned to the Rogue Trader. "Captain Vesti has a unique sense of humour! I strongly suggest that Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} take him in hand!"

languages.text: Palideciendo de ira, Mattina se giró hacia {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente. «¡El capitán Vesti tiene un sentido del humor muy peculiar! Mil{mf|ord|ady}, ¡le aconsejo que lo haga entrar en vereda!».
languages.original_text: White with anger, Mattina turned to the Rogue Trader. "Captain Vesti has a unique sense of humour! I strongly suggest that Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} take him in hand!"

traits.locale_text: Palideciendo de ira, Mattina se giró hacia {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente. «¡El capitán Vesti tiene un sentido del humor muy peculiar! Mil{mf|ord|ady}, ¡le aconsejo que lo haga entrar en vereda!».

languages.text: 马蒂娜气得脸色发白，转过头看着行商浪人。“维斯提上尉的幽默感确实很独到！我强烈建议您把他时刻带在身边，舰长大人！”
languages.original_text: White with anger, Mattina turned to the Rogue Trader. "Captain Vesti has a unique sense of humour! I strongly suggest that Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} take him in hand!"

traits.locale_text: 马蒂娜气得脸色发白，转过头看着行商浪人。“维斯提上尉的幽默感确实很独到！我强烈建议您把他时刻带在身边，舰长大人！”

languages.text: 怒りで顔面蒼白のマティナは、自由開拓者の方を向く。「ヴェスティ中隊長のユーモアセンスは変わっていますね！陛下の手でなんとかしていただきたいものです！」
languages.original_text: White with anger, Mattina turned to the Rogue Trader. "Captain Vesti has a unique sense of humour! I strongly suggest that Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} take him in hand!"

traits.locale_text: 怒りで顔面蒼白のマティナは、自由開拓者の方を向く。「ヴェスティ中隊長のユーモアセンスは変わっていますね！陛下の手でなんとかしていただきたいものです！」

languages.text: Weiß vor Zorn drehte Mattina sich zu {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} um. "Captain Vesti hat einen sehr eigenwilligen Sinn für Humor! Ich schlage dringend vor, dass Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ihn sich einmal vorknöpft!"
languages.original_text: White with anger, Mattina turned to the Rogue Trader. "Captain Vesti has a unique sense of humour! I strongly suggest that Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} take him in hand!"

traits.locale_text: Weiß vor Zorn drehte Mattina sich zu {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} um. "Captain Vesti hat einen sehr eigenwilligen Sinn für Humor! Ich schlage dringend vor, dass Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ihn sich einmal vorknöpft!"

languages.text: Blanche de colère, Mattina se tourna vers {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. « Le capitaine Vesti a un sens de l'humour particulier ! Je vous suggère vivement de le rappeler à l'ordre, Votre Seigneurie ! »
languages.original_text: White with anger, Mattina turned to the Rogue Trader. "Captain Vesti has a unique sense of humour! I strongly suggest that Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} take him in hand!"

traits.locale_text: Blanche de colère, Mattina se tourna vers {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. « Le capitaine Vesti a un sens de l'humour particulier ! Je vous suggère vivement de le rappeler à l'ordre, Votre Seigneurie ! »

languages.text: Öfkeden yüzü kireç gibi olan Mattina, Hür Tacir'e döndü. "Yüzbaşı Vesti'nin nevi şahsına münhasır bir mizah anlayışı var! {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, kendisini hizaya çekmenizi şiddetle tavsiye ederim!"
languages.original_text: White with anger, Mattina turned to the Rogue Trader. "Captain Vesti has a unique sense of humour! I strongly suggest that Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} take him in hand!"

traits.locale_text: Öfkeden yüzü kireç gibi olan Mattina, Hür Tacir'e dönüp konuştu: "Yüzbaşı Vesti'nin nevi şahsına münhasır bir mizah anlayışı var! {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, kendisini hizaya çekmenizi şiddetle tavsiye ederim!"
